title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: 4 Lots of Crypto Magazines up for grabs:LOT 1: 2x Bitcoin Magazines 10th Anniversary/To The Moon/Censorship/Orange PartyLOT 2: 2x yBitcoin Volume 2 Issue 1: Bitcoin BowlLOT 3: 2x New York TImes Magazine Beyond The Bitcoin BubbleLOT 4: yBitcoin Volume 1 Issue 4: Bitcoin Bowl / Bitcoin Magazine 10th Anniversary**Lots 1,2,3 will work on a LIFO system as seen in previous auctions**LOT 1 - second set not picturedLOT 2LOT 3LOT 4STARTING BID PER LOT PER SET: 0.0010BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT PER SET: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: MARCH 12th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: DECLINE TO BE LISTED
